Headline: Orange Line Service Delayed at Kedzie
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to unauthorized person on the tracks.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#62 Archer

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service between Midway and 35th/Archer in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Western, 103rd, Kedzie and 111th over regular route due to, street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#112 Vincennes/111th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Western, 103rd, Kedzie and 111th over regular route: due to, street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.
